org.daisy.braille.utils.impl.tools.embosser

Class FileToDeviceEmbosserWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.braille.utils.impl.tools.embosser.FileToDeviceEmbosserWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.daisy.dotify.api.embosser.EmbosserWriter, org.daisy.dotify.api.embosser.EmbosserWriterProperties

    public class FileToDeviceEmbosserWriter
extends Object
implements org.daisy.dotify.api.embosser.EmbosserWriter
    Provides a bridge between a Device and file based EmbosserWriter.

        Parameters:
        w - the underlying EmbosserWriter
        f - the file used by the supplied EmbosserWriter
        bd - the device to send the file to
